content: **knitted kerchief for children in drops cotton merino piece is knitted back and forth in lace pattern and i-cord ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern cm-014-bn yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** height measured along the middle = approx 23 cm width measured along the top side from side to side including tie = approx 101 cm **yarn** drops cotton merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 15 mustard **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
